CustomField.description: A formula to evaluate on various criteria whether this fulfilment should appear on a list of ones needing chasing.
CustomField.formula: BEGINS(FulfilmentTransferType__c, "EXTERNAL_TRANSFER_IN") && (FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Awaiting ad hoc action' || FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Chase transfer') && FulfilmentAmount__c > 5000 && FulfilmentDaysSinceSubmission__c > 9
CustomField.label: Fulfilment chaser view
